name: Exspelled
description:
Exspelled is a four player, free for all competitive game based in a magic town marketplace. Play as one of four little Wizarding students to defeat platforming puzzles, trick your friends and be the first to collect the four magical items on the map to claim your trophy! 

Use whatever strategy that works for you to win -- whether it be focusing on stealing your friends' hard earned ingredients, or relying on your superior platforming skills!

This blast from the past focusses on retro-style gameplay from the early 2000's, conjuring up memories from the days when you all set up your PC's at your mates house.

Actually, you'll still need to do that -- this is in Alpha, and is only available to play multiplayer through a LAN connection. Grab your 4 favourite mates (or worst enemies) and their laptops and pick a hang spot for some rowdy wizard fun. 

Features:

  • Ranged and melee fighting
  • Puzzle Platforming
  • Item collection
  • Strategy
  • Quick game's a good game! (10-15 minutes per game)

Feel free to get in touch with the team using our twitter handles, websites and emails below!
